article_title: In Kansas, managers’ income gains nearly match farm, telecom worker losses
article_text:
The state’s overall income growth in 2015 was seventh worst in nation

State’s personal income overall grew 2.5 percent

Oil, gas and agricultural incomes saw steep declines

article_metadata.title: In Kansas, managers’ income gains nearly match farm, telecom worker losses | The Wichita Eagle

og.description: Heavy layoffs at Sprint and a painful plunge in farm incomes in 2015 helped drop Kansas’ income growth to seventh worst in the nation, according to the U.S. Bureau of Economic Analysis.
